The names of these TathÄgatas.
If there are those who respectfully uphold and recite them,
Those sons and daughters of good family,
Will be able to generate a great deal of merit and virtue.
The Great Auspicious Goddess who has been prophesied by all TathÄgatas,
You will attain perfect enlightenment in the world adorned with auspicious jewels,
And will be called the TathÄgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, Auspicious Jewel Born from the Crown of the Head.
That world will be adorned with various celestial jewels.
In that world,
Only this TathÄgata will emit light.
The assembly of bodhisattvas in that Buddha-land,
Will naturally have immeasurable lifespans.
From the sky, the sounds of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saá¹ƒgha will be emitted.
All the bodhisattvas born in that Buddha-land,
Will all be born through transformation on lotus pedestals.
How are the twelve verses with one hundred and eight names praised as stainless?

This great auspicious mantra and one hundred and eight names
Can eliminate all afflictions
Can destroy all sins
Can hook and summon all blessings
Can eliminate all inauspiciousness
Can hook and summon all merits and virtues
If there are people who uphold, recite, and chant the names of all TathÄgatas,
They should rise early and make offerings to all Buddhas
With incense and flowers
For the Goddess of Auspiciousness
They should burn sandalwood incense and read this sÅ«tra
That person will soon attain all auspiciousness, all comfort and joy
All gods will protect and all endeavors will be accomplished
